<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Cancel Workout Plan On Submit</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
  // Get the sys_id of the existing record
  var sys_id = producer.u_reference.sys_id;

  // Retrieve the existing record
  var record = new GlideRecord('x_1117801_gym_mngt_transactions');
  record.get(sys_id);

  // Update the desired fields with the submitted data
  record.state = 4;

  // Update the record
  record.update();
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-07 14:45:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f52c5d549703b51070d034100153afcf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Cancel Workout Plan On Submit</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Gym Management" source="x_1117801_gym_mngt">5f9f328a976a311070d034100153af49</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Gym Management">5f9f328a976a311070d034100153af49</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_f52c5d549703b51070d034100153afcf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-07 14:52:47</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
